text.section:
No person shall knowingly:
Dispose of lead acid batteries by placing them in mixed solid waste;
Accept lead acid batteries for disposal in a landfill or an incinerator; or
Discard or abandon a lead acid battery in any manner except as allowed by subsection (2) of this section.

law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1990.
